310340.「やあ！ ボクは<%sL_NPC_NAME>。\n 天星郷の トップトレーナーと:
Yo! The name's <%sL_NPC_NAME>, muscle evangelist! I'm one of the Firmament's top trainers! Surely you've heard of me before, yeah?
I've been searching for talented individuals who are overflowing with potential! I've been keeping a sharp eye out.
Anyways! I think you're just the kind of muscle I've been looking for! You got talent, I can tell!
But you're still growing, I see. Well, that's no problem. With the right kind of training, you can get even stronger!
I will assess your current strengths and provide to you appropriate challenges that I deem fit to make you stronger.
And don't worry, I'll make sure you're rewarded for your hard work! So get out there and make me proud!

310341.「ボクの トレーニングを 試してみないかい？\n<yesno><break>:
So, you wanna try my training on for size?
<yesno><break>

310342.「ありがとう とても うれしい返事だ。\n 受けてくれると 感じていたよ！\n<:
Great! I'm glad to hear it! I had a feeling you'd accept.
So then, let's get started! Here's a list of some training regimens that I think are suited best to your abilities!

310344.「うん わかったよ！\n ボクはいつでも ここで待っているから\n 気が向いたら:
Sure, no problem! I'll always be here, so
give me a holler if you ever decide you
want to train!

310345.「やあ！ 来てくれてうれしいよ！\n 今日は どうしたんだい？\n<break>:
Oh, you're back! So, what'll it be today?
<break>

310346.「他にも 何かあるかな？\n<break>:
Anything else I can do for you?
<break>

310347.「おや もう行くんだね。\n またいつでも 会いにきてくれ！:
No problem. Feel free to come back anytime
you'd like!

310348.「トレーニング課題は だいじなものにある\n トレーニー育成帳で 確認できるから:
You can see your current regimens by using the
Trainee's Logbook in your Key Items. Feel free
to report what you've achieved at any time!

310349.「トレーニングの成果が あるんだね！\n まとめて 報告していくかい？\n<br:
Looks like your training's paid off!
You want me to check out what you've
done so far?
<break>

310350.「それじゃあ まとめて\n 教えてくれるかな！\n<br_break>:
Okay, I'll go ahead and look it over!
<br_break>

310351.「どの課題を 報告してくれるんだい？: Which regimen do you want to report?

310352.「うんうん……<wait 500> 輝いてるね！<wait 500>\n ナイス:
Mhm, mhm...What a glow up! You've really bulked up!
I can't help but admire what you've done! Nice work!
Here's that reward I promised you! Take it, you've earned it!

310353.「ごほうびの 経験値は\n 合計 <%nL_EXP> Pになるけど\n このまま:
Your total experience point reward comes to
<%dL_EXP> points.
Is that okay to accept now?
<yesno><break>

310354.「今の職業だと レベル上限に達しているから\n 経験値は 渡せないけど大丈夫かい:
Your current vocation can't get any stronger.
Do you still want to accept your experience
points?
<yesno><break>

310355.「ごほうびの 特訓スタンプは\n 合計 <%nL_EXP> 個になるけど\n こ:
Your total training stamp reward comes to
<%dL_EXP> stamps.
Is that okay to accept now?
<yesno><break>

310356.「今の職業だと 特訓スタンプが\n 上限に達しているから アイテムだけを\n 渡:
Your current vocation can't get any more
training stamps. Do you still want to
accept them?
<yesno><break>

310357.「わかったよ！\n それじゃあ 早速 教えてくれ！: Got it! Tell me all about it!

310358.<pc>は 報酬の経験値\n<%dL_EXP> Pを 手に入れた！\n<se_n:
<pc> received <%dL_EXP> EXP
as a reward!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

310359.<pc>は 報酬の特訓スタンプ\n<%dL_EXP> 個を 手に入れた！\n<s:
<pc> received <%dL_EXP> Training Stamps
as a reward!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

310361.<pc>は 課題<%nL_CLEAR_COUNT>件分の 報酬として\n経験値:
<pc> received <%dL_EXP> EXP as
a reward for completing <%dL_CLEAR_COUNT> regimens!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

310362.<pc>は 課題<%nL_CLEAR_COUNT>件分の 報酬として\n特訓スタ:
<pc> received <%dL_EXP> Training Stamps
as a reward for completing <%dL_CLEAR_COUNT> regimens!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

310363.<pc>は 課題<%nL_CLEAR_COUNT>件分の 報酬として\n達人経験:
<pc> received <%dL_EXP> Master Orb EXP
as a reward for completing <%dL_CLEAR_COUNT> regimens!
<se_nots System 7>
<bw_break>

310368.「もちものが いっぱいのようだね！\n ごほうびを渡したいから どうぐかばんを\:
It looks like you're carrying to much stuff!
Go and clear out your item bag so I can
give your reward to you!

310369.「トレーニングは まだ継続中みたいだね。\n 引き続き がんばってくれ！:
I see you're still in the middle of your
training. Keep up the good work!

310370.「トレーニングは まだ継続中みたいだね。\n 引き続き がんばってくれ！\n<b:
I see you're still in the middle of your
training. Keep up the good work!
<bw_break>

310371.「それじゃあ 引き続き\n トレーニング課題の 報告を待ってるよ！\n これから:
All righty then, I'll be waiting for your
updates on how your regimens are going!
Keep up the good work!

310372.「ナイスバルク！ 渡していた課題を\n すべて 達成できたみたいだ！\n<bw_:
You've really bulked up! Looks like you were
able to complete all of your regimens!
<bw_break>

310373.「他にも 今のキミに合わせた\n トレーニングを 用意してあるから\n 続けて:
I've got more training for that's tailored
just for you! You want to go ahead and
give it a try?
<yesno><break>

310374.「うん その向上心 ボクは好きだよ！\n それじゃあ……\n<bw_break>:
Yeah, I love the ambition! Okay, then...
<bw_break>

310375.「今回の トレーニング課題は これだよ！: These are your new training regimens!

310376.「キミの成長した姿が たのしみだ！\n また来てくれ！:
I'm looking forward to seeing your progress!
See you again soon!

310377.「すばらしい輝きを 見せてくれて ありがとう。\n キミの成長には いつも感動し:
Thank you for showing me an amazing glow up!
I'm always so impressed with how much you
improve!
<bw_break>

310378.「今は 少し身体を休めた方が いいね。\n トレーニングは 休息とワンセットなん:
I think you need to rest a little now.
Training is a combination of rest and
relaxation! Come again in a while!

310379.「今渡している トレーニングはないみたいだね。:
It seems there is no training currently being
given now.

310380.「じつは もう次の課題が 準備できているんだ！\n 受け取ってくれるかい？\n<:
As a matter of fact, I already have the next
assignment ready! Will you take it?
<yesno><break>

310381.「おや トレーニングを 達成しているのに\n ごほうびを 受け取っていない 課題:
Oh, I see you have an assignment for which you have completed the training but have not received your reward! Since you're here, why
don't you go ahead and report back to me.

310382.「トレーニング課題を 更新するんだね。\n 今のリストは 上書きされるけど 大丈:
You're going to update your training
assignments. Is it okay if the current list
gets overwritten?
<yesno2><break>

310383.「今週のトレーニング課題は それですべてだよ。\n<br>\n「毎週日曜日の 朝:
That's all for this week's training assignment. I'll have the next training assignment ready for you every Sunday morning
at 6:00 a.m., so come back and pick it up some other time.

310384.「またトレーニングを 受けてくれるんだね！\n<bw_break>:
I'm glad you're taking the training again!
<bw_break>

310385.「ふふ 鍛えたい気持ちは わかるけど\n 今はまだ トレーニング後の\n 休息に:
I understand your desire to work out, but for now, you need to focus on resting up after your training! I'll have the next training
assignment ready for you every Sunday morning at 6:00 a.m., so come back and pick it up again next time.

310386.「何について 聞きたいんだい？\n<break>:
What do you want to ask me about?
<break>

310387.「キミからは マッスルの才能を感じるんだ。\n だけど まだまだ 成長途中。\n:
I sense a talent for muscle in you. But you are still growing. Please let me nurture you! I'll give you training assignments based on
your condition, and I'll even give you some small rewards for your hard work! Let's work hard together!

310388.「トレーニングを したいとき\n まずは ボクから 課題リストを\n 受け取って:
When you want to train, you will first receive a list of assignments from me. In the list of assignments, you will find five training
tasks. You can work on each of them in parallel, in any order you like! When you have completed the assignments, come to me and
report back to me. You may report to me separately for each assignment, or you may report to me all together. Either way is fine!
The more training you do, the brighter you will become, so please do your best!

310389.「新しい 課題があるときは\n 手元の課題リストを 新しいものに\n 更新してあ:
When you have a new assignment, you can update your assignment list with the new one. You can update your list of assignments at any time,
even if you are still in the middle of an assignment. Be careful, however, that you don't forget to update your unfinished
assignments! The new issue list will be ready once a week, every Sunday morning at 6:00 a.m!

310390.「課題を 報告してくれたら\n 達成した課題に応じて ごほうびを渡すよ！\n<b:
If you report an assignment to me, I will give you a reward based on the tasks you have completed! Please note that the reward
experience will be given to the location when you report the assignment! Of course, if you come in training mode, you can also give your
reward with a training stamp.

310953.「やあ！ ボクは<%sL_NPC_NAME>。 \n 天星郷の トップトレーナー:
Yo! The name's <%sL_NPC_NAME>, muscle evangelist! I'm one of the Firmament's top trainers! Surely you've heard of me before, yeah?
I've been searching for talented individuals who are overflowing with potential! I've been keeping a sharp eye out.
I'm still working out the kinks, but once I'm all done coming up with the best regimen, I'd like you to give it a shot!

310954.「やあ！ ボクは<%sL_NPC_NAME>。\n 天星郷の トップトレーナーと:
Yo! The name's <%sL_NPC_NAME>, muscle evangelist! I'm one of the Firmament's top trainers! Surely you've heard of me before, yeah?
I've been searching for talented individuals who are overflowing with potential! I've been keeping a sharp eye out.
I think you're just the kind of muscle I've been looking for, but you seem a bit off at the moment.
Come back when you got a better grasp on being able to fly!

316085.「あと 達人経験値は\n 一度に ２０万までしか 受け取れないんだ。\n 超える:
Also, you can only receive up to 200,000
master experience at a time. The excess will
be lost, but is that still okay?
<yesno><break>
